Title: 41927 - # Reasons Why Buying a Slightly Older Smartphone Makes Sense
Direction: 675 words. Write four to eight reasons why it's a good idea to buy a smartphone that's not the most recent model. There's a pervasive idea that only the latest smartphones are the ones worth buying when older models are just as powerful. Smartphone technology has leveled off somewhat which means newer models are mostly tweaked versions of their predecessor. Someone who wants a good phone but doesn't want to spend the money is still well served by buying a slightly older model. Consider anchoring the URL in a sentence that discusses how the iPhone 6s runs all the latest apps and will continue to be a great value, even when the rumored iPhone 7 comes out in a few months. Your target audience is interested in saving money, so keep this in mind when writing.
Anchor Text: iphone 6s unrelated keyword (this could be “more information”, “click here”)
